item.description:
Woo-hoo! Looks like as gorgeous a day as yesterday so we are go go go!
HEY! All you Maybes! Its Novermber 2nd. Exactly how many more warm sunny days do you think you're gonna see?!?
Everyone please shoot to meet there at 11:45 so we can start hiking at 12:00. Some people need to get back early so we may do trails and/or split up depending on turn out and interest.

**REMEMBER THE CLOCKS WERE TURNED BACK***

Hey Gang!
I want to see if we can get in a Sleeping Giant hike on Sunday before the season's done altogether.
There's some terrific foliage out now and I bet it looks great from up there.

Lets meet in the parking lot by the main gate off Mt. Carmel across from Quinnipiac at noon. Last I checked, there's a $7.00/car entry fee for the lot, but you can park on the nearby street for free.

NOTE: Dogs are welcome!!

Trail lengths and difficulty will be determined when we get there based on who shows and what they're up for.

The weather forecast for Sunday is currently completely sunny, though a brisk 49 degrees. You may want to dress in layers and wear hats, gloves, etc. There's a couple places near there where we can stop for food after.

I'll update this Sunday morning if the weather is questionable. If its raining, its cancelled, but assume its on unless I post otherwise.

See you Sunday!
-Neil
203-645-2008 (unavailable from 10am-11am Sunday morning, but any messages will be returned shortly after 11.)
item.name: Sleeping Giant Hike
